rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 16 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 2:10 AM, 21 June 2025(Saturday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Laguna, Pampanga, Zambales and Rizal within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Quezon(Mauban, Real, Infanta, Polillo, Sampaloc), Batangas(Lobo), Bulacan(Hagonoy) and Bataan(Bagac, Morong, Mariveles) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
